ygData.subject: Re: This and That
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/27/99 5:06:57 PM Central Standard Time, Brangvyne@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/27/99 5:06:57 PM Central Standard Time,
Brangvyne@... writes:

<< I'll hopefully get this thing figured out shortly. If not I'll have to
contact them and cancel until I can get back up and on line.
:o( >>

He . . . he . . .
Here I am responding to my own post.
Well, I figured out the problem and got everything running and got back on EQ
and the thing locked up my system again. The only way to even get my computer
to re-boot at that point is to pull out the modem and then re-install it.
I will contact EQ and see if there is a patch of something that might help to
overcome this problem. If not I'm afraid that EQ is out for me for the
forseeable future as I can't afford another computer.
:o(
Bran
